contextId.information: This statement assumes that this woman is still living. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: Yahweh was a witness between you and the wife of your youth

contextId.information: This expression implies making husband and wife one flesh. AT: "make husband and wife one flesh" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
This statement implies that many of the Israelites had divorced their wives. (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:writing_background]])
contextId.quote: she was your companion and your wife by covenant
